text:
e="preserve">W. Terry McBrayer (September 1, 1937 – October 11, 2020) was an American lobbyist, attorney, and Democratic politician. He was born in Ironton, Ohio. He was a member of the Kentucky House of Representatives between 1966 until his retirement in 1976.
McBrayer died on October 11, 2020 in Lexington, Kentucky from cancer, aged 83.
